an3.48:1.1: “Himavantam, bhikkhave, pabbatarajam nissaya mahasala tihi vaddhihi vaddhanti.
an3.48:1.3: Sakhapattapalasena vaddhanti, tacapapatikaya vaddhanti, pheggusarena vaddhanti.
an3.48:1.4: Himavantam, bhikkhave, pabbatarajam nissaya mahasala imahi tihi vaddhihi vaddhanti.
an3.48:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, saddham kulapatim nissaya anto jano tihi vaddhihi vaddhati.
an3.48:2.3: Saddhaya vaddhati, silena vaddhati, pannaya vaddhati.
an3.48:2.4: Saddham, bhikkhave, kulapatim nissaya anto jano imahi tihi vaddhihi vaddhatiti.
